string.value:
Each time you clear a party quest, OSSS will issue you a #b#t04310004##k. 

Party Quest List:
#b<Moon Bunny>, <First Time Together>, <Ariant Coliseum>, <The Crack of Dimensions>, <Forest of Poison Fog>, <Monster Carnival>, <Monster Carnival 2>, <Remnant of the Goddess>, <Lord Pirate>, <Romeo and Juliet>, <Dragon Rider>#k

Return to #b#p9250134##k after clearing the party quest to receive a #b#t04310004##k.

Just remember that you can only get credit for 1 party quest a day.
You cleared the party quest and received a #b#t04310004##k from #b#p9250134##k.\r\n\r\nHold on to the #b#t04310004##k as it can be used to upgrade the Bing Machine-Alpha and Visitor equipment.
I've been thinking... If the aliens realized how united Maplers are, they might think twice about invading.
So the OSSS will issue a #b#t04310004##k to anyone who clears one of various party quests.

It doesn't matter which of the following party quests you clear. Just remember that you can only receive a medal for this once every day. 

#bParty Quest Type:
#b<Moon Bunny>, <First Time Together>, <Ariant Coliseum>, <The Crack of Dimensions>, <Forest of Poison Fog>, <Monster Carnival>, <Monster Carnival 2>, <Remnant of the Goddess>, <Lord Pirate>, <Romeo and Juliet>, <Dragon Rider>.
We ask for your assistance.\r\nYour help is greatly needed if we are to scare off those aliens.
Good luck.\r\nRemember that the future of Maple World is in your hands.
Who then will stand up for Maple World...?
You've cleared one of various party quests.
You haven't completed your assignment yet.
